workflow.title: Main - Casebook/Incident from ESA Verdict Update

properties.description:
Collect Verdict Update from Cisco ESA/CES and Create Casebook with the observable
Look for Sigthings/targets (excluding "VLNESA*" for the direct observables
If Targets exist, it creates an incident

Delay for schedule : min interval last 1H

properties.name: input_table_response_object

properties.script:
import json, sys
list1  = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
list_set = set(list1)
unique = []
unique_list = (list(list_set))
for x in unique_list:
    unique.append(x)
